title: Smartphone-Based Sight-Singing Learning System Development Course

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic music theory; no experience in reading sheet music
context.additional_context: Real-time feedback provision via smartphone-based speech synthesis technology.

learning_goals: Learners can identify various rhythm patterns from quarter notes to sixteenth notes with 90% accuracy.
Learners can listen to and sing single pitches within a two-octave range (C4–C6) with 80% accuracy.
Learners can sight-read simple four-measure melodies from sheet music with 70% accuracy.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
